WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing, because this is not reporting an issue.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi Friends,
Am planning to implement the conversion part of x12 to xml or excel in my application. How long it is possible to achieve using x12 parser? my application is .net application. Am very beginner and pls help me to achieve my results. Thanks

Comments.Message:
You should look at this page to get started:  http://x12parser.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Creating%20a%20flat%20file%20from%20the%20X12%20xml%20using%20XSLT%20and%20XslCompiledTransform.
This shows you how to transform into a csv format that can be open by Excel.  If you need special formatting you should do an xslt transformation into one of the Xml formats of Excel.
I did a transformation with about 20 columns of the 835 and that took me a couple of hours.

Since this is not reporting a bug, I am going to close this issue.  If you need additional help please start a discussion thread and I will answer your questions there.

Thank you for considering this tool in your solution.
